description: Virat Kohli is an Indian team cricketer who captains the International cricket team currently. Known for the best batsmen in the world. He has also captained under 19 and also won the under-19 world cup 2008 held in Malaysia. He has placed as ICC number one ranking for batsmen in 2013.
name: virat kohli | Indian National Cricket Captain
